Translations.Text: O vos believe non subsequentis steps Satan! Anyone subsequentis steps Satan know ut he advocates malus vice Si it est pro deus gratia vos His mercy nullus de vos purified Deus purifies whomever He testimentum. DEUS est Hearer Knower

Those among vos beatus resources wealth est charitable towards their relatives poor those immigrated DEUS. They treat them cum kindness tolerance; vos non love attain deus forgiveness? DEUS est Forgiver Merciful
Surely those falso accuse copulatus femina est pius believers incurred condemnation in hoc vita Hereafter they incurred horrendous retribution
Feria advenit when their suus tongues manus feet bear testis everything they perfecit
On feria DEUS testimentum requite them fully pro their works they testimentum invenit out ut DEUS est Truth
Malus femina malus vir malus vir malus femina bonus femina bonus vir bonus vir bonus femina. The latter est innocent de such accusations. They attained forgiveness generous reward
O vos believe non iniit domus alius than yours disponsationis ex their habitans greeting them! Hoc est bene vos ut vos take heed
